profile_positions.description:
The Salins Group is one of the main European salt producers and the only “pure salt producer” exclusively dedicated to the production and commercialization of salt. Salins is the only European producer who are experts in the 3 different salt production techniques – solar, vacuum and rock salt.

I am responsible for retail consumer salt supplied to the Benelux, Nordic, Middle East and African markets. Oversee all duties related to the marketing mix including product, packaging, pricing etc with a strong focus on creating value in the supply chain.
profile_positions.title: Segment Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for defining the marketing strategy for Retail and Water segments based on customer and market insight, creating country clustering and brand architecture to drive mid to long term business value. Develop marketing plans in collaboration with the Sales department in line with the marketing strategy specific to country, customer and monthly level based on the 4 P’s. 

Defined the annual segment budget, ran monthly and quarterly budget updates and adjustments. Drove segment ownership by creating and executing the segment marketing plans. Worked with research agencies to conduct ongoing market analyses to provide accurate and up to date market information. Owned portfolio optimization and innovation pipeline management work-streams looking at the commercial health and product lifecycle of the portfolio.

A strong focus on reducing complexity in the business portfolio, so as to improve service delivery by simplifying daily operations and improving OEE. 

Project management: lead various projects in the retail and water treatment segments. Contribute to the PDR process by streamlining and digitising various tasks associated to new product development, phase out and maintenance of articles.

Industries include Paper, Plastics, Glass, Mining, Food and Beverages, Industrial, Pharmaceutical, Agriculture and Energy solutions.

Managed the implementation of the Bud brand to 12 underlying companies and oversaw integration of their brand assets. Communication of group values through digital and traditional media platforms.

Lead various conferences and events for group companies. Implemented communication tools for both incoming and outgoing communication.

profile_positions.description:

Launched the Cerebos Snow campaign on digital and traditional communication channels which won a Gold Loerie as well as AdWeek international ad of the day. The campaign created the same PR value in the first week after launching was 2x production value of the TVC, a great return on investment. 

Facilitated the acquisition of a bottling company as a means to vertically integrate HDPE production as well as providing a means to launch in to the water category, which was a by product for the company at the time. 

Introduced a range of Low Sodium solutions in to both B2B and B2C categories adding 15x value compared to every ton of regular product sold. Focused on shifting the sales team to a value driven mindset.

Lead of a team of 5 members including trade manager, data analysts, coordinator, marketing manager and brand planner.
